headline: Former UN Ambassador Nikki Haley claims Biden's Afghan exit debacle and the Nord Stream 2 pipeline are to blame for emboldening Putin to invade Ukraine: Says it is 'lunacy' to continue to buy Russian oil
author: Melissa Koenig
sentences:
why don't the people involved in the Keystone and all the other utilities just go back to work and start the operation and begin, on their own, the process of taking that oil out of the ground and to the refineries for processing - FJB and all the mini-demcommies who think they can control us - compare this to 1776 and begin our own economic revolution, to bring some sanity into our country - "No Taxation Without Representation" and No Economic Vassalage, to this corrupt federal government
Captain Obvious has spoken.

Well... she's not one of my favorites because she stabbed President Trump in the back...but WE should be using our own engery...and WE all know it....now obama and Kerry have US negotiating with Iran for oil...with Russia at the bargaining table...talk about insanity...not only is biden several cards short of a full deck...but it seems...Washington's swamp is determined to bring America to her knees...either they are that stupid...or they are traitors...

Nikki Haley, former United Nations ambassador for the U.S., slammed President Joe Biden's leadership in the Ukraine conflict on Sunday and said it's 'absolute lunacy' the country continues to buy Russian oil after Vladimir Putin launched an invasion last month.In an interview with FOX Business' Maria Bartiromo on Sunday Morning Futures, Haley said the United States never should have trusted Russia or Putin.
